mecs.iot.proj.om2m

Class Services

  • java.lang.Object
    • mecs.iot.proj.om2m.Services

  • public class Services
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of oneM2M services. Static methods allow manipulation of JSON objects, while instance methods are meant to be used on a Client object (Client.services)
    Since:
    0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
    Version:
    0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    Alessandro Trifoglio

    • Method Detail

      • packJSON

        public static java.lang.String packJSON(java.lang.String json)
        Pack a JSON string. Makes a JSON string suited to be sent towards an oneM2M service.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to pack
        Returns:
        the packed string

      • unpackJSON

        public static java.lang.String unpackJSON(java.lang.String json)
        Unpack a JSON string. Converts a JSON coming from an oneM2M service into a well-formed JSON string.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to unpack
        Returns:
        the unpacked string

      • formatJSON

        public static java.lang.String formatJSON(java.lang.String json)
        Format a JSON string. Converts an inline JSON string into an expanded and better readable one. Ideal for GUIs.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to format
        Returns:
        the formatted string

      • parseJSON

        public static java.lang.String parseJSON(java.lang.String json,
                                         java.lang.String outerAttr,
                                         java.lang.String[] attr,
                                         java.lang.Class<?>[] attrType)
                                  throws org.json.JSONException
        Parse a JSON string. Gets a JSON string and retrieves a string containing the content of an arbitrary number of attributes inside a main outer JSON container. Example:
        • Services.parseJSON("{"m2m:ae":{"rn":"state","ty":2}}", "m2m:ae", new String[] {"rn","ty"}, new Class<?>[] {String.class,Integer.class}); retrieves "rn=state, ty=2"
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to parse
        outerAttr - the outer attribute
        attr - the array of attributes to extract content from
        attrType - an array of types describing the class of contents
        Returns:
        the parsed string of attributes and their content
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • parseJSON

        public static java.lang.String parseJSON(java.lang.String json,
                                         java.lang.String[] outerAttr,
                                         java.lang.String[] attr,
                                         java.lang.Class<?>[] attrType)
                                  throws org.json.JSONException
        Parse a JSON string. Gets a JSON string and retrieves a string containing the content of an arbitrary number of attributes inside a main outer JSON container. Example:
        • con = Services.parseJSON(notification, new String[] {"m2m:sgn","m2m:nev","m2m:rep","m2m:cin"}, new String[] {"con"}, new Class<?>[] {String.class}); may retrieve for instance "con=(\"mn\":\"augmented-things-MN\",\"id\":\"user.ALESSANDRO-K7NR\")"
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to parse
        outerAttr - an array of attributes identifying the outer container
        attr - the array of attributes to extract content from
        attrType - an array of types describing the class of contents
        Returns:
        the parsed string of attributes and their content
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • parseJSONObject

        public static java.lang.String parseJSONObject(java.lang.String json,
                                               java.lang.String attr,
                                               java.lang.Class<?> attrType)
                                        throws org.json.JSONException
        Parse a JSON string. Gets a JSON string and retrieves a string containing the content of an inner attribute.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to parse
        attr - the attribute to extract content from
        attrType - a type describing the class of content
        Returns:
        the content of requested attribute
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • parseJSONObject

        public static java.lang.String parseJSONObject(java.lang.String json,
                                               java.lang.String outerAttr,
                                               java.lang.String attr,
                                               java.lang.Class<?> attrType)
                                        throws org.json.JSONException
        Parse a JSON string. Gets a JSON string and retrieves a string containing the content of an attribute inside a main outer JSON container.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to parse
        outerAttr - the outer attribute
        attr - the attribute to extract content from
        attrType - a type describing the class of content
        Returns:
        the content of requested attribute
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • parseJSONArray

        public static java.lang.String[] parseJSONArray(java.lang.String json,
                                                java.lang.String[] outerAttr,
                                                java.lang.String attr)
                                         throws org.json.JSONException,
                                                java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Parse a JSON string. Gets a JSON string and retrieves a string containing the content of an attribute embedded multiple times inside a JSON array. Example:
        • id = parseJSONArray(json,new String[] {"subs","receiver"},"id");
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to parse
        outerAttr - an array of attributes identifying the array and the outer container
        attr - the attribute to extract content from (assumed of type String)
        Returns:
        an array containing all instances of the requested attribute inside the array
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
